scripts.watch: npx vue-cli-service build --inline-vue --mode development --dest static/dist --target lib --watch vue/index.js
scripts.build: npx vue-cli-service build --inline-vue --mode development --dest static/dist --target lib vue/index.js --report
scripts.build-prod: npx vue-cli-service build --inline-vue --dest static/dist --target lib vue/index.js
